name: api_animation_AnimationClip
description: Provides an asset that assigns animation curves to animatable properties.

properties.name: empty
properties.description: Returns true if the animation clip has no curves and no events.

properties.name: events
properties.description: Animation Events for this animation clip.

properties.name: frameRate
properties.description: Frame rate at which keyframes are sampled. (Read Only)

properties.name: hasGenericRootTransform
properties.description: Returns true if the Animation has animation on the root transform.

properties.name: hasMotionCurves
properties.description: Returns true if the AnimationClip has root motion curves.

properties.name: hasMotionFloatCurves
properties.description: Returns true if the AnimationClip has editor curves for its root motion.

properties.name: hasRootCurves
properties.description: Returns true if the AnimationClip has root Curves.

properties.name: humanMotion
properties.description: Returns true if the animation contains curve that drives a humanoid rig.

properties.name: legacy
properties.description: Set to true if the AnimationClip will be used with the Legacy Animation component ( instead of the Animator ).

properties.name: localBounds
properties.description: AABB of this Animation Clip in local space of Animation component that it is attached too.

properties.name: wrapMode
properties.description: Sets the default wrap mode used in the animation state.
